review: "Big Nate Flips Out" is a hilarious addition to the Big Nate series, maintaining the same light-hearted and engaging tone that fans have come to love. Nate's antics and his friendship with Francis are both charming and relatable, making it a perfect read for anyone looking for a good laugh and a dash of middle-grade adventure. The illustrations add an extra layer of fun, bringing the story to life in a vivid and entertaining way.
